dict.acceptation: 公众信息；宣传效用；宣传；公诸于众的状况；

sent.orig: Publicity, Publicity, Publicity is the greatest factor and force in our public life.
sent.trans: 公开、公开、公开，是公共生活领域最伟大的要素和力量源泉。

sent.orig: Business rule 27: publicity, publicity, publicity again!
sent.trans: 创业法则二十七：宣传、宣传、再宣传！

sent.orig: Is their much-reported romance a publicity stunt that is only done to get publicity?
sent.trans: 他们这段被过渡报道的浪漫故事是不是只是给公众作秀？

sent.orig: In the in-school publicity, they made special publicity in different schools.
sent.trans: 校内宣传中，针对部分院系，如计算机学院，软件学院等进行专门的宣传。

sent.orig: So if we get some good publicity, maybe it will offset some of the bad publicity.
sent.trans: 所以如果我们得到某种有力宣传的话，可能会抵消那些糟糕的公众影响。
